Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.commonGoalCard

Class CommonGoalShape

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.commonGoalCard.CommonGoalShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonGoalCard
public class CommonGoalShape extends Object implements CommonGoalCard
This class represents a type of common goal card that has a defined shape and occurrence

    • findShape

      public HashMap<ItemTileType,Integer> findShape(ItemTile[][] bookshelf, int[][] coords, HashMap<ItemTileType,ArrayList<int[]>> locked, HashMap<ItemTileType,ArrayList<int[]>> lockedAdjacent)
      This method inspect the bookshelf matrix and fill a hashmap with the tiles type and their occurrences. Fill the hashmaps 'locked' and 'lockedAdjacent' with the tiles to not inspect
